Text: Did it ever occur to you that the foul language may be an intentional trick to unravel the true nature of those who claim to be "open minded"? I'm afraid today too many people listen to perfectly worded, rhetorically compelling lies.
At least the author isn't yet another Zionist jew supporter of APARTHEID israel.

"In a world where religion is traditionally free from ridicule"
whoever wrote this needs to get out more. This has not been true for a long time. At least not in the US and europe. It's quite out here in the open. I admit its probably "frowned upon" in Islamic extremist states, so I wouldn't try it there.
to clarify - I mean just the words I quoted, not the book

Joshua is 13 your age?  (No disrespect meant)

Anyone older than a teenager would know that religion was 'traditionally' show respect.

Of course it isn't nowadays.  Even my pet dog knows that it is mumbo jumbo and fairy tales!!
